page.title: 11A Killamarsh Nurse
page.content: Nurse Robinson came to our school and talked about her job.She has a lot of work to do in her job.She starts work at a quarter to nine and leaves at half past four.In her job she mostly checks children's eyes.Nurse Robinson goes to 16 schools and sees over 4000 children.She likes her job very much and has been a nurse for twenty two years.She has to wear a uniform and it is a blue dress,black coat and a blue and black hat.She knows 30 other nurses in this area and she had to train for four years to become one.She comes into St. Giles school every two weeks usually on a Tuesday.In any one day she has to visit two different schools.I think Nurse Robinson is a kind and understanding person who does a difficult job.I am glad we have a nurse to look after all our problems.
